violations.description:
Async function 'createMessageWithoutTryCatch' contains unprotected await expression. await anthropic.messages.create({
    model: 'clau... may throw unhandled errors.
violations.suggested_fix: MUST wrap await client.messages.create() in try-catch block. Catch block should check error instanceof Anthropic.APIError and handle specific error types (RateLimitError, AuthenticationError, etc.) appropriately.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. APIError with error.status and error.message - this will crash the application.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. APIError, can occur mid-stream after initial 200 response - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: MUST wrap await client.messages.stream() in try-catch block. Should also wrap stream iteration in try-catch to handle mid-stream errors. Check error types for proper recovery.
